alert.note: Alert for Caddo (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 5:36PM CDT until April 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 536 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Boone, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Anadarko, Fort Cobb, Gracemont, and Fort Cobb Reservoir. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
